undecided
Class EnemyTank

java.lang.Object
  java.util.Observable
      undecided.EnemyTank

public class EnemyTank
extends java.util.Observable

This class is the enemy tank and will control its AI, health, movements, etc.

Author:
Team Exception
See Also:
PlayerTank, TankView

public EnemyTank(Point p,

Method Detail

startEnemyTank

public void startEnemyTank()
This method will start the thread that will begin the enemy tank's movement across the map.

Returns:
the speed of the tank (int)

setSpeed

public void setSpeed(int speed)
This method will set the speed depending on the terrain it is on. Depending if the terrain is ice, grass, or sand, the speed will be set to either 7, 5, or 3 respectively.

Parameters:
speed - rate at which the tank will move across the screen
